title: i cant get lvl 7
body: hello. so I'm a leesin main and I play lee sin for quit a while now and I'm getting s+ s- and didn't got the lvl 7 shard and I'm lvl 6 so is there any anything I can do to get lvl 7 and is the server  bugged ????

replies.body: I looked into this for you to see what's going on, but I wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary.  I do see you've played a few Lee Sin matches, but they did not result in an S grade.  Per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, make sure that you're playing in summoner's rift and earning an S or above.  S- will not earn a token for level 7.  Best of luck!
